metadata.title: Truth or Dare Online - Fun Game with Friends | Truth or Dare
metadata.description: Play Truth or Dare online for free! Over 500+ fun questions and daring challenges. Perfect group game for parties, birthdays, and friend gatherings.

guide.title: Truth or Dare Game Guide - Complete Rules
guide.description: Detailed guide on how to play Truth or Dare. Game rules, tips and tricks to create a fun atmosphere for your group.
guide.whatIsDescription: Truth or Dare is a popular group game worldwide, especially loved at parties, birthdays, and friend gatherings. The game helps people get to know each other better and creates fun, memorable moments.
guide.readyToPlayDescription: Start playing Truth or Dare now with over 500+ fun questions and challenges!

ratingModal.title: Rate your experience
ratingModal.description: Share your thoughts about the game

defaultComments.love: Excellent! I really love this game!
defaultComments.happy: Pretty good, I'm satisfied with the gaming experience
defaultComments.neutral: Normal, could be improved a bit
defaultComments.thankYou: Thank you for your feedback about the game!
defaultComments.okay: The gaming experience is okay, could be improved
defaultComments.needsImprovement: The game needs much more improvement
